contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=June 2007}} [[File:Example of BDSM Art.png|thumb|Example of fetish art.]] A '''fetish artist''' is a [[sculptor]], [[illustrator]], or [[Painting|painter]] who makes [[fetish art]] which depicts people in [[fetishism|fetishistic]] situations. ==Early fetish artists, 1940s-1990s== * [[Roberto Baldazzini]] * [[Robert Bishop (artist)|Robert Bishop]] (a.k.a. The Bishop, Ashely) * [[Art Frahm]] * [[Mario (fetish artist)|Mario]] * [[Eric Stanton]] (a.k.a. John Bee, Savage) * [[Tom of Finland]] * [[Alberto Vargas]] * [[John Willie]] * [[Robert Mapplethorpe]] * [[:fr:Gilles Berquet|Gilles Berquet]] * [[Hans Bellmer]] * [[Bob Carlos Clarke]] ==Recent fetish artists== * [[Marc Breed]] * [[Patrick Conlon (artist)|Patrick Conlon]] * [[Spencer J. Derry]] * [[Drubskin]] * [[Steve Diet Goedde]] * [[Namio Harukawa]] * [[Richard Kern]] * [[Doris Kloster]] * [[Eric Kroll]] * [[Michael Manning (fetish artist)|Michael Manning]] * [[Ken Marcus]] * [[Nathaniel Milljour]] * [[Sardax]] * [[Franco Saudelli]] * [[Hajime Sorayama]] * [[Roy Stuart (photographer)|Roy Stuart]] * [[Tom Sutton]] (a.k.a. Dementia) * [[Philip Warner]] * [[Ludovic Goubet ]] ==Incidental fetish artists== ===Illustrators and graphic novelists=== Many artists working in the mainstream comic book field have consistently included fetishistic imagery in their work, usually as a shock tactic or to denote villainy or corruption. * [[Brian Bolland]] * [[John Byrne (comics)|John Byrne]], ''X-Men'', ''Fantastic Four'' * [[Howard Chaykin]], ''American Flagg'', ''Black Kiss'' * [[Daniel Clowes]], ''Eightball'' * [[Alan Davis]], ''Excalibur'' * [[Steve Dillon]], ''Preacher'' * [[Frank Miller (comics)|Frank Miller]], ''Sin City'', ''The Dark Knight Strikes Again'' === Visual artists === The following fine artists have included fetishistic elements in their art: * [[Allen Jones (sculptor)|Allen Jones]] * [[Helmut Newton]] * [[Andres Serrano]] == See also == * [[History of erotic depictions]] * [[List of BDSM artists]] ==References== {{reflist}} {{Sex}} {{Sex fetish}} [[Category:Fetish artists|*]] [[Category:Lists of artists|Fetish artists]]
